ARABIC: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And remember Our slaves Ibrahim, Ishaq and Ya'qub, men of true strength and inner sight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Remember Our votaries Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of power and insight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And remember Our servants -- Abraham, Isaac and Jacob -- they were endowed with great strength and vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), recall Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, all of whom possessed virtuous hands and clear visions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember Our bondmen Ibrahim, and Ishaq, and Yaqub – the men of power and knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And remember Our servants, Ibrahim, Ishaq, and Ya`qub, Ulil-Aydi wal-Absar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And remember Our servants Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqoub, men of power and insight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Remember also Our servants Abraham, Isaac and Jacob -- men of might they and of vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And make mention of Our bondmen, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of parts and vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Remember Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob -- possessors of strength and vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And remember thou Our bond men, Ibrahim and Is-haq and Ya'qub. owners of might ana insight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of strength and insight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, possessors of Power and Vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And remember Our slaves, Ibrahim (Abraham), Ishaque (Isaac), and Ya'qub (Jacob), (all) owners of strength (in worshipping Us) and (also) of religious understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Also, remember Our worshipers Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, those of might and vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention Our servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—endowed with ability and vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:45] And mention [also] Our servants Abraham, and Isaac and Jacob — men of fortitude, vigorous in their worship, and insight, deep understanding of religion (a variant reading [for ‘ibādanā, ‘Our servants’] has [singular] ‘abdanā, ‘Our servant’, with Ibrāhīma as the explication thereof, and what follows as being a supplement to ‘abdanā, ‘Our servant’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And make mention of our bondmen, Abraham) the friend of the Beneficent, (Isaac and Jacob, men of parts) men of strength in the worship of Allah (and vision) regarding Religion.
